content: knitted spiral beanie skill level advanced beginner materials used lion brand® wool-ease® thick & quick® ● grey marble 640-154 1 ball or any bulky yarn ● stitch markers ● 1 8mm #12 circular needle ● 1 9mm #13 circular needle optional ● pom pom maker ● 4 pointed knitting needles for crown decrease size adult large knit gauge 4in x 4in 9 sts x 12 r on #13 9mm approx dimensions/circumference width- 18 46 cm height -10 25 cm t2l instructions ● insert needle into the second stitch on the right work needle through the back loop and knit the stitch leaving it on the needle ● bring your working needle around the front of your work and insert your needle into the first stitch knitwise and knit the stitch as normal ensure the stitch is facing you and not twisted ● slip both stitches off the main needle together main body using 8mm circular needles cast on 56 stitches the pattern calls for a multiple of 5 stitches minus 1 to work in the round work k1 p1 ribbing for about 1-1 5 inches work k1 p1 ribbing for about 1-1 5 inches round 1- knit till end of round add 3 stitch evenly 59 stitches switch to 9mm circular needles round 2 -*k3 t2l* till end keep repeating round 2 until it measured 8 inches end the round with the t2l at the end remember to adjust/move the beginning of the stitch marker when you come across the tl2 in between rounds crown decrease round 1-*k2 together k1 t2l* till end of round round 2-*k2 t2l* till end round 3-*k2 together t2l* till end of round leave long tail and pass thru stitches pull tight and tie off weave in ends or keep to tie pom pom notes this pattern makes a hat that fits comfortably and made specifically for a large head or a person with very thick hair
